prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, Bass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Piano, Guitar, Bass, and a Synth Pad, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Synth Pad, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This song has Drums, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and a Synth Pad, Reed excluded.
